[00:00.00]Dos Oruguitas (From "Encanto"/Soundtrack Version) - Sebastian Yatra
[00:02.10]Lyrics by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:04.20]Composed by：Lin-Manuel Miranda
[00:06.30]Dos oruguitas enamoradas
[00:10.42]
[00:11.34]Pasan sus noches y madrugadas
[00:15.44]
[00:16.44]Llenas de hambre
[00:17.70]
[00:18.83]Siguen andando y navegando un mundo
[00:22.57]
[00:23.23]Que cambia y sigue cambiando
[00:25.20]
[00:25.78]Navegando un mundo
[00:27.72]
[00:28.31]Que cambia y sigue cambiando
[00:30.71]
[00:31.63]Dos oruguitas paran el viento
[00:35.59]
[00:36.86]Mientras se abrazan con sentimiento
[00:41.82]Siguen creciendo no saben cuándo
[00:46.11]Buscar algún rincón
[00:47.57]
[00:48.52]El tiempo sigue cambiando
[00:50.51]
[00:51.07]Inseparables son
[00:52.80]
[00:53.37]El tiempo sigue cambiando
[00:55.82]
[00:56.58]Ay oruguitas no se aguanten más
[01:01.87]Hay que crecer a parte y volver
[01:04.58]Hacia adelante seguirás
[01:06.81]Vienen milagros vienen crisálidas
[01:11.87]Hay que partir y construir su propio futuro

[01:27.03]Vienen milagros vienen crisálidas

[01:37.14]
[01:57.65]Dos oruguitas desorientadas
[02:01.65]
[02:02.92]En dos capullos bien abrigadas
[02:06.80]
[02:07.81]Con sueños nuevos
[02:09.21]
[02:10.21]Ya solo falta hacer lo necesario
[02:13.43]
[02:14.21]En el mundo que sigue cambiando
[02:16.69]Tumbando sus paredes
[02:19.05]Ahí viene nuestro milagro
[02:21.47]Nuestro milagro
[02:22.62]Nuestro milagro

[00:06.30]两只坠入爱河的小毛毛虫
[00:10.42]
[00:11.34]日日夜夜都
[00:15.44]
[00:16.44]饥肠辘辘
[00:17.70]
[00:18.83]它们步履不停 环游世界
[00:22.57]
[00:23.23]世界千变万化
[00:25.20]
[00:25.78]它们环游在这个世界
[00:27.72]
[00:28.31]世界千变万化
[00:30.71]
[00:31.63]两只小毛毛虫挡住了风
[00:35.59]
[00:36.86]它们深情拥抱
[00:41.82]它们一直在成长 不知道什么时候
[00:46.11]该找个栖身的角落
[00:47.57]
[00:48.52]时间匆匆而过
[00:50.51]
[00:51.07]它们不可分离
[00:52.80]
[00:53.37]时间匆匆而过
[00:55.82]
[00:56.58]小毛毛虫们 别再坚持了
[01:01.87]你们必须分开 长大之后再回来
[01:04.58]你要继续前进
[01:06.81]奇迹到来 结成了蛹
[01:11.87]必须要分开 去创造属于自己的未来
[01:16.74]小毛毛虫们 别再坚持了

[01:37.14]
[01:57.65]两只迷失自我的毛毛虫
[02:01.65]
[02:02.92]在两个能保护自己的蛹中
[02:06.80]
[02:07.81]做着新的梦
[02:09.21]
[02:10.21]现在你只需要做你该做的事情
[02:13.43]
[02:14.21]在一个瞬息万变的世界
[02:16.69]推倒阻挡你的高墙
[02:19.05]我们的奇迹到来
[02:21.47]我们的奇迹
[02:22.62]我们的奇迹
[02:23.80]我们的奇迹

[02:31.48]你们必须分开 长大之后再回来
[02:34.17]你要继续前进
